str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Middle - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To lay hold of, take hold of, seize (sometimes with beneficent, sometimes with hostile, intent).
From the base of sozo and that of sthenoo; of safe strength; Sosthenes, a Christian.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From arche and sunagoge; director of the synagogue services.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To beat, strike, wound, inflict punishment.
From en and pros; in front of (literally or figuratively) or time).
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From the base of basis; a step, i.e. Foot-breath; by implication, a rostrum, i.e. A tribunal.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: It is a care, it is an object of anxiety, it concerns. A primary verb; to be of interest to, i.e. To concern.
Of Latin origin; Gallion, a Roman officer.
